decision_conditions: Insufficient details and an inadequate landscaping plan (in terms of the type, location and extent of planting) has been provided in relation to condition 11 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission 22/00420/FUL, therefore failing to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, contrary to policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

It has not been satisfactorily demonstrated that 5 no. bicycles could be safely and conveniently stored and accessed in the garage alongside any vehicular parking, contrary to policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

description: Details required for Conditions 11 (Landscaping Scheme), 15 (Cycle Parking Facilities) and 18 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/00420/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of two storey replacement dwelling with rooms in loft space and new vehicle crossover).
